mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERRESUME( USERRESUMENO, RESUMESCHOOL, RESUMEUSERMAJOR, RESUMEMAJORSTARTDAY, RESUMEMAJORENDDAY, RESUMEMAJORUSEROPENLEVEL, RESUMEEDUCATION, RESUMEEDUCATIONSTARTDAY, RESUMEEDUCATIONENDDAY, RESUMEEDUCATIONCENTER, RESUMEEDUCATIONOPENLEVEL, RESUMELICENSE, RESUMELICENSECENTER, RESUMELICENSEDAY, RESUMELICENSEOPENLEVEL, RESUMELANGUAGE, RESUMELANGUAGEGRADE, RESUMELANGUAGEOPENLEVEL, USERNO) VALUES( USERRESUMENO_SEQUENCE.NEXTVAL, #{resumeSchool}, #{resumeUserMajor}, #{resumeMajorStartDay}, #{resumeMajorEndDay}, #{resumeMajorUserOpenLevel}, #{resumeEducation}, #{resumeEducationStartDay}, #{resumeEducationEndDay}, #{resumeEducationCenter}, #{resumeEducationOpenLevel}, #{resumeLicense}, #{resumeLicenseCenter}, #{resumeLicenseDay}, #{resumeLicenseOpenLevel}, #{resumeLanguage}, #{resumeLanguageGrade}, #{resumeLanguageOpenLevel}, #{userNo})
